chats.question: What it is
chats.answer:
NestJS is framework to build server site apps  
Build on Node.js, Express.js and TypeScript  
Using Angular concepts on backend  
It provides structure for architecture level

chats.question: New Project
chats.answer:
create repo in github, name: nestjs_tutorial, no readme and gitignore  
clone it with gitbash
```bash
git clone https://github.com/atari-monk/nestjs_tutorial.git
```
run admin powershell
```bash
cd "C:\atari-monk\code"
```
```bash
npm i -g @nestjs/cli
```
```bash
nest new nestjs_tutorial
```
choose npm
```bash
cd nestjs_tutorial
```
```bash
code .
```
```bash
npm run start:dev
```
veriffy port 3000 in src/main.ts, i edited to 49
```bash
localhost:3049
```
